Articles.Content:
(Sorry if this is wrong forum subsection)

I was trying to build a rocket one day, and noticed I couldn't launch anything, and I couldn't load any rocket files. I shrugged it off, because I use the SPH more than the VAB.

I just got KW Rocketry (forgetting my VAB file was missing) I went to install subassembilies and saw I only had the SPH file,not the VAB file.

I am using a modded version of KSP (B9 pack and KW Rocketry).

Not sure why it's gone. Anyone have an extra copy of it?

I'm a little curious as to the nature of your problem. Can you access the VAB at all, or are there just no ship files available?

If it's the former you should run the patcher (if you don't have a patcher.exe in your main install open up the launcher first)

If it's the latter I suggest moving the ship files into your save (especially if you are in career mode)

If it's just simply the ships/VAB directory in your save, you can make a new folder manually.

If its the KSP/Ships/VAB folder, you can also manually create an empty one. No need to download it unless you really want the stock sample craft.
